actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to reimburse licensed pharmacists for the cost of drugs furnished by such pharmacists to veterans in accordance with a prescription provided by a Veterans' Administration physician.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to reimburse licensed pharmacists for the cost of drugs furnished to veterans without charge in accordance with a prescription provided by a Veterans' Administration physician.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to reimburse licensed pharmacists for the cost of drugs furnished by such pharmacists to veterans in accordance with a prescription provided by a Veterans' Administration physician.
